title: Love Island's Jess Shears breastfeeds her newborn in sweet video with husband Dom Lever
text:
They recently welcomed their first child together and have been sharing updates of the little one ever since.

And new father Dom Lever, 28, took to Instagram on Thursday to post a short video of his wife Jess Shears, 26, breastfeeding their new arrival.

Jess - who recently came under fire for working out so soon after giving birth - looked every inch the proud mother in the sweet clip.

New parents: Jess Shears, 26, smiled and did a thumbs up as she breastfed her baby in the car after stopping at a service station with husband Dom Lever, 28, on Thursday

The Love Island stars were seen sat inside their car at a service station while Jess fed the baby, whose name and gender has not yet been announced.

Dom, who was wearing a black puffer jacket with a fur hood, smiled as he spoke to the camera.

He then panned around to Jess, who was glowing in a long-sleeved cream jumper and had her blonde tresses pulled back.

Proud dad: Dom smiled as he panned the camera around to his wife feeding their first child. The star was wearing a black puffer jacket with a fur hood and smiled as he spoke to camera

The new mother sweetly did a thumbs up to the camera as she smiled and continued feeding her baby.

Speaking to the camera, Dom said: 'There is nothing more real than stopping at a services to breastfeed.'

The youngster appeared to be swaddled in a white and blue patterned blanket and seemed perfectly content during the car time feed.

Quick feed: The Love Island stars looked relaxed as they stopped in their car, with father Dom saying: 'There is nothing more real than stopping at a services to breastfeed'

The outing came after Jess revealed she had jumped back into her fitness routine after she was seen lifting dumbbells at the gym in a video shared by Dom.

Jess was then forced to hit back at trolls who had slammed her for being in the gym so soon after giving birth.

She wrote: 'Can people stop assuming they know anything about the birth of our child.

'Just because we chose to share an image yesterday does not mean that's when they were born. Dom, baby and I are happy, healthy and recovering at our own rate.'

New parents: The outing came after Jess revealed she had jumped back into her fitness routine after she was seen lifting dumbbells at the gym in a video shared by Dom

Hit back: Not about to take the criticism lying down, Jess fired back and told the trolls that they didn't know when she gave birth and told them to stop making assumptions

On Saturday October 5 the couple, who met on the ITV2 reality show two years ago, shared the first snaps of their baby, but did not reveal the sex or name of their first born.

Jess simply wrote 'Baby Lever' next to the adorable photograph of her baby sleeping in a white baby-grow, while her husband Dom posted a shot of himself walking away carrying their child in a car seat, which he captioned 'baby we did it.'

The beauty also took to her Instagram stories to share Dom's post, adding the heartwarming caption: 'My whole world' followed by a red heart emoji.

New mother: Jess looked radiant just days after giving birth to her first child with Dom in a short video shared on Instagram on Sunday

Glowing: The new mother appeared relaxed as she spent some time with her little one, whose name is not yet known, while wearing a white crop top and black bottoms

A couple of hours later, Dom followed suit, sharing a snap of Jess when heavily pregnant, writing: 'So much respect and love for everything you've done' alongside a red heart.

Jess and Dom announced that they were expecting their first child in May 2019, seven months after tying the knot.

The pair met on Love Island in 2017 and became the first contestants to have sex in the secret hideaway.

They became engaged after three months of dating and married in a romantic ceremony in the Greek Island of Mykonos in October 2018.

New addition: She simply wrote 'Baby Lever' next to the cute photograph of her tiny baby sleeping in a white baby-grow on Saturday
description: Proud father Dom Lever, 28, shared a short clip of his wife Jess Shears, 26, breastfeeding their baby, whose name is not yet known, on Instagram on Thursday.
